title: Decision-Making Styles and Managerial Creativity of Nursing Managers in Saudi Arabia: A Multi-Center Cross-Sectional Study.
title_1: Decision-making styles and managerial creativity of nursing managers in Saudi Arabia: A multi-center cross-sectional study
lead_author_contact_details:
Department of Family and Community Medicine, College of Medicine, Imam Abdulrahman Bin Faisal University,
Dammam 34224, Saudi Arabia; naalamer@iau.edu.sa
notes: Has 3 age groups (less than 30, 30-40, and 40+). Using the two extreme groups. Gender done across age.
aim_of_study_1: Examine relationship between decision-making styles and managerial creativity of nursing managers.
age_notes:
Older group = 40+ yrs
Young group = Less than 30 yrs
